code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=_ref=>{let{setIsAuthenticated}=_ref;const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/login"),{password});if(response.data.authenticated){setIsAuthenticated(true);navigate('/AdminAddCars');}else{alert('סיסמה לא נכונה');}}catch(error){console.error('Error logging in:',error);alert('אירעה שגיאה במהלך ההתחברות');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex items-center justify-center min-h-screen bg-gray-100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-8 rounded shadow-md w-full max-w-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl mb-4 text-center",children:"\u05D4\u05EA\u05D7\u05D1\u05E8\u05D5\u05EA \u05DE\u05E0\u05D4\u05DC"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,className:"space-y-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"block text-center",children:"\u05E1\u05D9\u05E1\u05DE\u05D4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),className:"p-2 border rounded w-full text-center"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"p-2 bg-blue-500 text-white rounded w-full",children:"\u05D4\u05EA\u05D7\u05D1\u05E8"})]})]})});};export default Login;
